mcq.statement: Choose the sentence that is punctuated correctly: He said to his disciples, "watch and, pray", He said to his disciples' "watch and pray.", He said to his disciples "Watch and pray., He said to his disciples, "Watch and pray."

options.a: He said to his disciples, "watch and, pray"
options.b: He said to his disciples' "watch and pray."
options.c: He said to his disciples "Watch and pray."
options.d: He said to his disciples, "Watch and pray."
